title: Week 1: Introduction to AI and Agent Architectures
description: Overview of AI, history, and definitions; Introduction to intelligent agents.

title: Week 2: Components of Intelligent Agents
description: Types of agents, rationality, and simple reflex agents.

title: Week 3: Search Algorithms
description: Introduction to search algorithms; breadth-first and depth-first search.

title: Week 4: Advanced Search Techniques
description: A* Search, heuristics, and optimization strategies.

title: Week 5: Constraint Satisfaction Problems
description: Formulation and resolution of CSPs; backtracking algorithms.

title: Week 6: Multi-Agent Systems
description: Introduction to multi-agent search and cooperative behavior.

title: Week 7: Game Playing
description: Minimax algorithm, alpha-beta pruning, and strategies.

title: Week 8: Propositional Logic
description: Fundamentals of logic, syntax, and semantics.

title: Week 9: First-Order Logic
description: Introduction to FOL, predicates, and quantifiers.

title: Week 11: Decision Making: Markov Decision Processes
description: MDPs, reward functions, and value iteration.

title: Week 12: Introduction to Reinforcement Learning
description: Overview of RL, rewards, policies, and exploration vs. exploitation.

title: Week 14: Basics of Machine Learning
description: Introduction to ML paradigms; supervised vs unsupervised learning.

title: Week 15: Deep Learning Fundamentals
description: Neural networks, deep learning frameworks, and applications.

title: Week 16: Project Presentations and Final Review
description: Group project presentations summarizing applied AI techniques and preparation for the final exam.
